mapper.select: select top 10 a.dates as date , 'C44000074' as salecode , '广东广集医药有限公司' as salename , 'c.businesscode' as purcode , 'c.businessname' as purname , d.goodscode as goodcode , d.goodsname as goodname , '' as goodspec , '' as batchcode , '' as sum , '' as unit , '' as price , '' as amount , '' as manufacturer , '' as approvalNo , a.Address as adress, CONVERT(varchar,GETDATE(),120) as createtime from saleoutmt a join saleoutdt b on a.billno=b.billno join businessdoc c on a.clientid=c.businessid join goodsdoc d on d.goodsid=b.goodsid join goodsattr f on b.goodsid=f.goodsid join BatchCode e on e.AngleId=b.AngleId and e.GoodsId=b.GoodsId where DateDiff(dd,dates,getdate())between 0 and 120

select top 10 a.dates as date , c.businesscode as salecode , c.businessname as salename , 'C44000074' as purcode , '广东广集医药有限公司' as purname , d.goodscode as goodcode , d.goodsname as goodname , d.GoodsSpec as goodspec , e.batchcode as batchcode , b.Num as sum , b.unit as unit , b.price , b.amount , d.manufacturer , f.approvalNo , CONVERT(varchar,GETDATE(),120) as createtime from purinmt a join purindt b on a.billno=b.billno join businessdoc c on a.SuppliersId=c.businessid join goodsdoc d on d.goodsid=b.goodsid join goodsattr f on b.goodsid=f.goodsid join BatchCode e on e.AngleId=b.AngleId and e.GoodsId=b.GoodsId where DateDiff(dd,dates,getdate())between 0 and 120

select top 10 GETDATE() as date , 'C44000074' as businessCode , '广东广集医药有限公司' as businessName , a.goodscode , a.goodsname , f.GoodsSpec , c.batchcode , e.placenum as storeNum , unit , manufacturer , '正常可销' as storeFlag , b.approvalNo , manufacturer , CONVERT(varchar,GETDATE(),120) as createTime from goodsdoc a join goodsattr b on a.goodsid=b.goodsid join BatchCode c on a.GoodsId=c.GoodsId join AngleBalance e on c.AngleId=e.AngleId and e.GoodsId=a.GoodsId join PGPrice f on f.goodsid=a.goodsid and isbase='Y'
